message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product for sale that I think you'll be very interested in. I'm offering it to you for $175. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could we possibly negotiate the price down to $150?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $165.  This is a great deal on a valuable product, and I'm confident it will be worth it for you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I really appreciate it. Would you consider $155 as a fair price for the product?
